name: Tunnel Mole
description:
## Tunnel Mole

The tunnel mole gives a 25% increase to stone mines.

~~You can craft this item at the Goblin Blacksmith in the game.~~ **Sold out!**

## Supply

10000

### Crafting Costs

---

- 25 Stone
- 5 SFL

[Link](https://docs.sunflower-land.com/player-guides/rare-and-limited-items#boosts)
